author: Special Correspondent
text:
A. Vishwa Prabhu (45) of Bethaniapuram, who attempted self-immolation on the Collectorate premises on Wednesday demanding action against his aunt for alleged land grabbing, succumbed on Saturday.

Police said Prabhu breathed his last around 11.30 a.m. at the Government Rajaji Hospital. He complained that his aunt Kasiammal denied rights over an ancestral property of four cents at two places in the city to his mother.
title: Suicide bid: man succumbs in GRH
